projectSubtitle: — my personal web project for your business
quote: Web and video are my tools for your success.
paragraph1: Hi! I'm Eldar — a videographer and web developer, founder of QVRIX, my personal digital project. I create websites and videos that not only look great but also engage, evoke emotions, and deliver results.
paragraph2: My roots are in video production: I tell stories, capture atmosphere, and create visuals that leave a lasting impression. I also code and build websites where these stories come to life — fast, convenient, and responsive. If you're interested, I'd be happy to discuss how I can help.
